EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

params.recordFound: Whether a Multipass record was found for the sender.
params.validUtil: The timestamp until which the sender's Multipass record is valid.

params.user: The address of the user who claimed.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

params.lifeTimeScore: The new aggregate lifetime score of the proposal.
params.proposedTimes: The total number of times the proposal has been submitted.
params.repostedTimes: The total number of times the proposal has been reposted.

params.dailyScore: The new daily score of the proposal.
params.day: The day the score was updated.
params.proposer: The address of the proposal's creator.

params.dailyScore: The new daily score of the proposal.
params.day: The day the score was updated.
params.proposer: The address of the proposal's creator.

params.newTimesProposed: The new total count of times this proposal has been made.

params.day: Day number when the proposal was created

params.reposter: The address of the user who reposted.
The address of the user who reposted.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params.day: Day number when the vote was cast
params.proposal: Hash of the proposal being voted on

claim(string).details: A user must have a valid Multipass record to call this function. They can only claim once per day. If `data` is provided, it's treated as a proposal. If the proposal is new for the day, it's created. If it's a duplicate of an existing proposal for the day, it's counted as a repost. Claiming also resets the user's daily support allowance.

params.data: The proposal text. If empty, no proposal is submitted.

claimOnboardingBonus(address).details: The onboarding bonus is a one-time reward for new users. The bonus is claimed by calling this function. The bonus is added to the user's balance. The bonus is only claimable once.

params.user: The address of the user claiming the bonus.

constructor.details: Intentionally empty as initialization happens in initialize()

currentDay().details: The day is calculated as `block.timestamp / 1 days`.

returns._0: A `DailyProposal` struct with the proposal's daily information.
The count of proposals for that day.

returns.dailyClaimAmount: The amount of tokens for a daily claim.
returns.dailySupportAmount: The amount of support points available daily.

params.user: The address of the user to query.

returns.claimedToday: A boolean indicating if the user has claimed today.
returns.supportSpent: The amount of support points the user has spent today.

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.details: This function is called once to set up the contract's initial state. It sets the Multipass contract instance, the governance token, the pauser address, and the daily claim/support amounts.

params._multipass: The address of the Multipass contract.
params._pauser: The address that has permission to pause and unpause the contract.
params._token: The address of the DistributableGovernanceERC20 token contract.
params.dailyClaim: The amount of tokens users can claim daily.
params.dailySupport: The amount of support points users can allocate daily.
params.domainName: The Multipass domain name for identity verification.

params.user: The address of the user to query.

returns._0: The day number of the last claim. Returns 0 if never claimed.
The `IMultipass` contract instance used for identity checks.

pause().details: Can only be called by the WorldMultiSig contract

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.proposal: Hash of the proposal to query

returns._0: uint256 Current score/votes for the proposal

support((bytes32,uint256)[]).details: This function implements a quadratic voting mechanism where the cost to support is the square of the amount. A user must have claimed their tokens for the current day before they can support proposals. The total support spent cannot exceed the `dailySupportAmount`. Users cannot support their own proposals.

params.votes: An array of `VoteElement` structs, each containing a proposal hash and the amount of support.

returns._0: The `DistributableGovernanceERC20` token contract used for UBI.

unpause().details: Can only be called by the WorldMultiSig contract

InvalidSender(bool,uint256).notice: Error thrown when a user without a valid Multipass record tries to interact with the contract.

Claimed(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a user successfully claims their daily tokens.

ProposalLifetimeScore(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Event emitted when a proposal's lifetime statistics are updated.

ProposalScoreUpdatedByAddress(uint256,ui.notice: Event emitted when a proposal's daily score is updated, indexed by proposer.

ProposalScoreUpdatedByProposal(uint256,u.notice: Event emitted when a proposal's daily score is updated, indexed by proposal hash.

ProposedTime(bytes32,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a proposal is made, indicating how many times it has been proposed.

ProposingByAddress(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Event for tracking proposals by address

RepostByProposer(address,uint256,bytes32.notice: Event emitted when a user reposts an existing proposal, indexed by original proposer.

RepostByReposter(address,uint256,bytes32.notice: Event emitted when a user reposts an existing proposal, indexed by reposter.

VotingByAddress(address,uint256,bytes32,.notice: Event emitted when a user votes on proposals

claim(string).notice: Allows a user to claim their daily tokens and optionally submit a proposal.

claimOnboardingBonus(address).notice: Allows a user to claim their onboarding bonus.

currentDay().notice: Calculates the current day based on the block timestamp.

getProposalDailyScore(bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets the details of a proposal for a specific day.

getProposalsCnt(uint256).notice: Gets the total number of unique proposals for a specific day.

getUBIParams().notice: Retrieves the main parameters of the UBI system.

getUserState(address).notice: Gets the current daily state for a user.

lastClaimedAt(address).notice: Gets the day a user last claimed their tokens.

pause().notice: Pauses all contract functions with the whenNotPaused modifier

pauser().notice: Gets the address of the pauser.

proposalLifetimeStats(bytes32).notice: Gets the total score for a proposal

support((bytes32,uint256)[]).notice: Allows a user to support one or more proposals from the previous day.

token().notice: Gets the governance token contract instance.

unpause().notice: Pauses all contract functions with the whenNotPaused modifier

userdoc.notice: This contract manages a UBI system where users can claim daily tokens and support proposals. It integrates with Multipass for identity verification and uses an ERC20 token for distribution. Users can claim a fixed amount of tokens daily. After claiming, they can also propose ideas or support existing ones from the previous day using a quadratic voting mechanism. The contract is upgradeable and pausable.
